H0.text: On the 4th, which half of a famous musical act died in California, aged 74. John Fogerty

H1.text: On the 4th, which half of a famous musical act died in California, aged 74. Robin Gibb

H2.text: On the 4th, which half of a famous musical act died in California, aged 74. Mike Hucknall

H3.text: On the 4th, which half of a famous musical act died in California, aged 74. Don Everly

A4.text: Robin Gibb died in May 2012 at the age of 62 from liver and kidney failure.

A5.text: Don Everly died in Nashville on August 21, 2021, aged 84.

A6.text: John Fogerty performed an Australian tour in March 2008.

A8.text: John Fogerty later commented on the demise of CCR in a 1997 edition of the Swedish magazine Pop
